refnamediv.refpurpose: Examples for analog input scan functions.

refsection.title: Example 1: Read with blocking mode
refsection.para: This example shows how to acquire data from analog input channels 1-8, sample rate 10 kHz, duration 1 sec. Blocking mode is enabled, functions are called without link_id.
refsection.title: Example 2: Read with non-blocking mode
refsection.para: This example shows how to acquire data from analog input channels 1-8, sample rate 10 kHz, duration 1 sec. Non-blocking mode is enabled, functions are called without link_id.
